review: an ideal expansion for crusader kings 2 improving the religious simulation in a game focused largely on the crusades with an improved papacy system more interation with the pope and interaction with holy orders the sons of abraham dlc expands the base game in the right way  the dlc pairs well with the sword of islam dlc through the hajj by bringing rival schools of islamic thought into the political scene and islamic religious traits into the game
